passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(3) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > main:nth-child(3) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > form:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(3) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(3) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(3) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > h4:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid

none.message: Value of lang attribute is included in the list of valid languages
